trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4ARMOR_00562_CRAFSMAN00532_000_000<tab>I've brought everything I need into our camp here in Hydatos, but I shall need time to set up an efficient workspace. Any armor commissions will have to wait a little longer, I'm afraid.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4ARMOR_00562_CRAFSMAN00532_000_010<tab>You wish to have some armor forged? I am sorry, but I must insist that pieces made from Pyros materials be commissioned within the camp in Pyros.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4ARMOR_00562_CRAFSMAN00532_000_020<tab>Master Gerolt's reputation for excellence is, if anything, an understatement. His workmanship is exquisite─somehow both bold and breathtakingly delicate at the same time. Ah, I am privileged to behold such talent in such close proximity...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4ARMOR_00562_CRAFSMAN00532_100_020<tab>Master Drake's designs require specialized materials, but if followed precisely, then it should be possible to imbue your armor with enhanced elemental might. Such an exceptionally brilliant technique!
